item.source: Anyone who has 4+ Star look at this cant get portals to work?

item.title: Anyone who has 4+ Star look at this cant get portals to work?
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

I have 4 stars :o

Here you go.

i am guessing this is a 317. If so this is what u do:

1.) go into spawning-config.cfg (something like that, havent worked with 317 ina while)
2.) get a id of a portal (note it cant be the same id as a current portal)
3.) put something like this in:

spawn = (portal id) (position coords) (position coords) 0 0 0 0 04.)
Go into clicking button’s.java and add something along these lines:

case (case id): if (c.teleAction == 199) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(coords, coords, 0); c.sendMessage("Welcome to bla bla bla"); }
hope i helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone who has 4+ Star look at this cant get portals to work?
item.dc:creator: @M0R3TANK1NG M0R3TANK1NG
item.description:
@M0R3TANK1NG wrote:

Have you linked them up to anywhere, have you spawned them in properly?

If you haven’t linked them up anywhere, use this:

teleportToX = 0;
teleportToY = 0;

If you haven’t spawned them in properly, make sure you add this:

CreateObject((XCOORD) (YCOORD), (ID), 10, 0, 0);//NAME

For example:

case (ID):
if(playerRights == 0) {
teleportToX = (location)
teleportToY = (location)
showDialogue(“Message if wanted”);

break;

Read full topic
